title: Teambuilder Chroma packs issue
body:
Not sure if gameplay or client issue.

Unfortunately, it seems that I am unable to select my chroma pack colors for Lucian in a teambuilder. I'm not sure if this was intended, or if I simply missed something, but I'd love to be able to use those haha.

1. Start Teambuilder  (Either solo or group)
2. Be unable to select chroma

Would love some help with this

replies.body: Riot has said that Chroma packs won't work with Teambuilder for a while...

Hey TheRedHeadband, 

We're still working out some of the tech with chromas and Team Builder. It's currently intended (while not optimal) that chromas cannot be selected in Team Builder.

EDIT: Looks like [Reddit detectives](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/34ghel/how_to_use_chroma_skins_in_teambuilder/) may have figured out a way around this!
